title: Riot Games makes some of the best music I have ever heard!
body:
Most of us enjoy to play League of Legends for its fun gameplay but I love to listen to their music that they produce! From the orchrestral soundtracks that make me feel like I'm going on a thrilling adventure or the fast, tense, songs that make me feel like a battle is about to happen and to the upbeat rock like songs such as "Get Jinxed.' I have a large library of some of the songs just to listen to on the go or even while doing homework. I have to give kudos to such a wonderful music team at Riot. What are your favorite tracks that they have produced? 

Some of mine in no particular order: 
Bilgewater Theme
Howling Abyss Theme
Crystal Scar Theme
Ekko Login
Jinx Login
Kindred Login
World Collide 
Arcade 2015 Login
Season 5 login

replies.body: The Bilgewater/Gangplank music may forever be my favorite piece. In the course of a mix I might listen to a track hundreds of times. At some point fatigue sets in, but Bilgewater NEVER got old.

Then let me ask you something:

WHY THE FUCK ISN'T THAT AN OPTION?

I miss Bilgewater's theme and GP announcer...

In game, sadly no, BUT TO THE INTERNET! HUZZAH!

https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends
Harass whoever's responsible. Throw oranges at them until they do it.

Good job Riot.

Your music is one of the things that has always been exceptional and solid effort.
That would be so cool! I actually play the track during a game sometimes due to how good it was. "Your feedin the fishes!" XD

I personally love the loose feeling of the instrumentation. It feels like the track is this weird Irish party in the back of a dimly lit fishing cottage in Bilgewater. It's got a feeling of imperfection that just elevates it so much.

Omg yes! Like how you said it feels like an irish party in the back plus  you can hear a group singing the melody at few points in the song. Tell the music team thanks and to keep doing awesome things! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
omg yassss

The amount of satan in that room...
**
it fills you with determination**
ikr XD
You talk about their music and don't mention Smite & Ignite? You have no clue how hard it is for me to not downvote bot you into oblivion.

I'm so sorry man I just joined league this summer Im going down the list of music from the most recent to th past. Im really close to the pentakill ablum I also said "some of my favorites" I would list more XCCCC

URF LOGIN WILL FOREVER BE THE BEST!! THAT WAS SOOOOOOOOOOO GOOD MAN, I LOVE IT!

ok thank you.
Oh I only said "some" of my favorites URF is so bawse ^_^
well yea, i would agree that music&arts are actually the most gifted teams within Riot.
I do like a lot of the more recent music. the snowdown 2015 music is actually SUPER good and just makes me feel good. Diana login, PROJECT login, Ekko login... the arcade one... lots of good ones.
I came to league around this summer Ive been trying to go thorughout the past years but the recent are really good :D
I have to say Pokemon has better music. Still enjoy league's music more than anything else in the game though :/.
I could see why i enjoy a few pokemon tracks :)

I agree. They make some fantastic stuff. 

New Gangplank theme was amazing.
omg Ikr!
